This will delete selected cache files and free up disk space.

If system shows much more than here, it's an Android cache issue.

Solutions:
1. Restart device
2. Wait for system update
3. Open system settings
Highly recommended if no special requirements\nSwitching modes may cause data loss. Ensure all platform settings are consistent. Do not switch casually

Set to 0 MB to disable cache. Restart required after changing limit.
This software (NeriPlayer) is a cross-platform audio/video player tool that only provides technical framework and playback functions. It does not store or provide any audio/video content.

All playable content is accessed by users from third-party platforms. Copyright belongs to the original content providers. This software assumes no responsibility for the legality, accuracy, or availability of third-party platform content.
Users must comply with local laws and regulations and third-party platform terms of service, and assume all legal responsibilities arising from using this software to access third-party content.

This software may integrate third-party platform APIs or services, which are subject to their respective terms of service and privacy policies. Users should understand and agree to third-party policies when using related functions.

This software does not collect any personal information, does not track user behavior, and does not transmit user data to any third party. All user data (such as play history, favorites) is stored only on the user\'s device or in cloud storage services chosen by the user.

This software is provided \"as is\" without any express or implied warranties. The developer assumes no responsibility for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of this software.
Users must ensure their use of this software complies with local laws and regulations. Some features may be unavailable due to regional policy differences.
This statement may be updated from time to time, and the updated version will be published in the software. Continued use of this software indicates acceptance of the updated terms.
By using this software, you indicate that you have read, understood, and agreed to all content on this page. If you do not agree, please stop using and uninstall this software immediately.
Incomplete GitHub sync configuration detected. Token may have expired or been deleted. Please reconfigure in settings.

Will open built-in browser (desktop UA) to visit music.163.com. After successful login, tap \"Done\" in the upper right corner.

Are you sure you want to delete this playlist? This action cannot be undone!
Are you sure you want to remove %d selected songs from the playlist?

This software (NeriPlayer) is a cross-platform audio/video player tool, used only to integrate and play public content from multiple third-party online platforms. The software itself does not upload, distribute, or modify any audio/video files; it does not store any user content or third-party content on the server side. For offline playback convenience, this software provides a "save to local device only" download function. The download process does not go through the developer\'s server and will not perform any cloud sync or backup.
All playable content is accessed by users from third-party platforms, and copyright and related rights belong to the original author or platform;
Users should comply with the laws and regulations of their country/region when using;
The software supports downloading audio/video content from third-party platforms to the user\'s local device, but will not upload, sync, or store to any server;
Do not infringe on third-party content in any way.
Users should confirm the legal source and usage rights of accessed and downloaded content;
The developer does not guarantee the legality or availability of third-party platform content;
Legal risks arising from user actions (including downloading, sharing, distributing, etc.) are the user\'s own responsibility.
Some functions of this software rely on third-party platform interfaces and services;
The developer makes no guarantees regarding the stability, compatibility, or timeliness of third-party services;
Users should review and comply with the terms of use and privacy policies of each platform.
This software does not collect any personal information;
This software does not collect any device information;
This software does not perform behavior tracking, analysis, or user profiling;
Play records, search records, etc. are only kept locally;
When users initiate downloads, files are only saved to local storage and will not be sent back to the developer or any third party;
No third-party statistics, crash analysis, or advertising SDKs are integrated;
Third-party platform access logs are handled by that platform according to its privacy policy;

GitHub Sync Feature (Optional): Users can choose to back up playlist data to their own GitHub private repository. Tokens are encrypted and stored locally using Android Keystore, and developers cannot access them;
This privacy statement was last updated: 2025-01-07.
This software is provided "as is" without any warranty regarding stability, etc.;
To the extent permitted by law, the developer is not responsible for losses caused by use (including download actions);
The above limitations apply even if the developer has been advised of the possibility of such losses.
Users should ensure that their use and download actions comply with the laws of their jurisdiction.
The developer may update this disclaimer and privacy statement from time to time. Continued use indicates acceptance of the updates.
By using this software, you indicate that you have read, understood, and agreed to all content on this page. If you do not agree, please uninstall and stop using.
